title: How to Contact Fox News to Make a Comment or Complaint

steps.title: Call Fox News at 1-888-369-4762.
steps.content: Call Fox News at 1-888-369-4762 . Whereas some networks mostly encourage online submission of comments, Fox News does provide viewers with a 1-800 customer service number. You can use this phone number if you have a general inquiry, comment, suggestion, or concern. [1] X Research source Be prepared to go through a series of phone prompts when you dial the number. These prompts will direct you to the person or department you need to speak with.

steps.title: Fill out the contact form on the Fox News website.
steps.content: Fill out the contact form on the Fox News website. Go to the Fox News help page and select a topic from the dropdown menu. Then, fill in your personal information and message as prompted. Add any attachments you would like to, then submit your request. This portal is a great avenue for contacting the network with news comments, story corrections, or news tips . [2] X Research source If sending a correction or story question, specify when the story was on and what it was about. Corrections should be backed with outside, reliable sources . If sending in a tip, indicate the topic and location. Also, provide any sources you have to support or verify the tip.

steps.title: Reach out to Fox hosts or shows on Facebook or Twitter.
steps.content: Reach out to Fox hosts or shows on Facebook or Twitter. You can reach out to the main Fox News pages via their Twitter account or Facebook account . The hosts who are on Facebook and Twitter have social media buttons above their biographies on the Fox News website. Go to the Fox personalities page and click on the name of the person you want to contact. Then, click on the social media button in their biography. If you have a lengthy comment to make, a personal comment, or a simple comment but are not a “fan” of Fox News on Facebook, you will need to click on the “Message” button at the top of the Fox News Facebook page to send a private message . You can also send news tips by tweeting them to the main Fox News account or posting them on Facebook. Fox News is also interested in videos or photos of news happening in your area.

steps.title: Find contact information for local affiliates on the Fox website.
steps.content: Find contact information for local affiliates on the Fox website. Go to this page and browse through the local affiliates to find the one you’re searching for. You can find each station's address, phone number, and website. Simply use the listed address and phone number for your local station to get in touch with a representative.

steps.title: Email the Fox News Press Office via irena.briganti@foxnews.com.
steps.content: Email the Fox News Press Office via irena.briganti@foxnews.com. Currently, Irena Briganti is the Group Senior Vice President of Media Relations at Fox News. You can send her an email to inquire about press releases and related topics at irena.briganti@foxnews.com . [3] X Research source

steps.title: Email a specific Fox News show by finding their show contact page.
steps.content: Email a specific Fox News show by finding their show contact page. Go to the Fox News show page and click on the show you're interested in contacting. Scroll through the page and look for a sidebar labeled "Contact the Show." Fill in your personal info and comments as prompted, then send your message. You can also look at the websites for specific TV personalities to find their email addresses. For instance, you can reach Sean Hannity at hannity@foxnews.com or Bret Baier through this link .

steps.title: Email FOXaroundtheworld@foxnews.com if you live outside the US.
steps.content: Email FOXaroundtheworld@foxnews.com if you live outside the US. If you live outside the United States but watch Fox News on the Internet or on television, let them know your suggestion, tip, or complaint by sending an email to FOXaroundtheworld@foxnews.com . You can also use this email address to let Fox News know that you would like to view their news channel even though the channel is not available in your area.

steps.title: Write Fox News at 1211 Avenue of the Americas, NYC.
steps.content: Write Fox News at 1211 Avenue of the Americas, NYC. Contact Fox News the old-fashioned way by sending snail mail to their physical address. Send your correspondence to: [4] X Research source Fox News Channel 1211 Avenue of the Americas New York, NY 10036

steps.title: Use the Fox News help page for questions relating to television.
steps.content: Use the Fox News help page for questions relating to television. The network’s website has a help page in which you can search topics you want information about; it’s probably a good idea to see if a frequently asked questions page answers your question before calling. Questions addressed include how to find jobs or internships at Fox News, where you can buy Fox News products, and issues with the Fox News App for Xbox 360. The page also addresses many programming questions, ranging from information on how polls are conducted to program scheduling.

steps.title: Find answers to online-related questions on the help page.
steps.content: Find answers to online-related questions on the help page. The network also has a help page devoted to answering questions related to its online products. This page includes information on the playing of videos and online commenting. [5] X Research source Technical errors addressed on this page include loading issues with stories on FoxNews.com and link issues. The page also provides information on signing into and deleting a FoxNews.com account. You can also sign up for breaking news alerts on the page.

steps.title: Get help with mobile devices on the designated page.
steps.content: Get help with mobile devices on the designated page. Fox also has a page that answers questions relating to mobile devices. You can find information about the Android and iPhone versions of the Fox News mobile app, as well as iPad accessibility and information about the Xbox app.

steps.title: How do I get the Fox Nation Military & Veteran’s offer?
steps.content: How do I get the Fox Nation Military & Veteran’s offer? If you’re looking to learn more about Fox Nation ’s Military & Veteran’s offer, watch this video demo to sign up as an existing customer or this video demo to sign up as a new customer.

steps.title: How do I get the Fox Nation First Responders offer?
steps.content: How do I get the Fox Nation First Responders offer? Read through this complete tutorial from Fox News to sign up for their First Responders offer. You can also learn more about the offer at this link .

steps.title: How do I contact Sean Hannity?
steps.content: How do I contact Sean Hannity? If you want to get in touch with Sean Hannity —the current host of FOX News Channel’s Hannity —navigate to his official website and click the three horizontal bars at the top-right of the screen. Click Contact Us , then fill out the form to send a message to Sean Hannity and his team.

steps.title: How do I contact Tucker Carlson?
steps.content: How do I contact Tucker Carlson? If you want to get in touch with Tucker Carlson —the former host of FOX News Channel’s Tucker Carlson Tonight —send him an email at tips@TCNetwork.com . [6] X Research source

steps.title: How do I contact Jesse Watters?
steps.content: How do I contact Jesse Watters? If you want to get in touch with Jesse Watters —current FOX News host—you can call him at (929) 286-7479 or email him at watters@Fox.com .
